long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Point is a powerful email extension that helps you get your time back by quickly summarizing emails so you can get to the important points faster. With The Point, you can quickly scan through emails to identify key messages and easily save time when reading long emails. Enjoy a more efficient way of reading emails and make the most of your day with The Point!
